entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM32-linux: JIT/Directed/tailcall/more_tailcalls/more_tailcalls times out in GCStress runs. #100464
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) on Entity Framework running inside docker container on arm32 #100462
  • [Windows] Take job object affinitization into account for processor count and thread-spreading #100459
    9.0.0
  • Follow up issue. We should probably never see a BBJ_ALWAYS block ending with a throw. #100458

Closed

  • Disabling JavaScript disables .NET Timers in WebAssembly #100463
  • System.AppContext.BaseDirectory returns path to directory content instead of path to directory #100448
  • Assertion failed: (GetComponentSize() <= 2) || IsArray() #86273
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Define _TIME_BITS=64 globally #100461
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100221
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix "Cleanup some string operating functions" PR #100451
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • FixOptRepeat and force repeating #100447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix intermittent failures due to unalignment access #100431
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net 8 not installable on Ubuntu 24.04 #39907
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk - error MSB3073 (tsc: not found) #39906

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `await foreach` utilizing struct enumerator never ends #72820
  • Likely unexpected breaking change introduced recently for `await using` #72819
  • Autocomplete for `/** */` Documentation Comments #72815
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Print diagnostics in invariant culture (English error messages) in assert text #72816
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Experimental idea: Remove the global file-path-to-document-ids map at the solution level. #72792
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2418390 #72813
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reapply "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Produce a warning for redundant patterns #69698
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputText crash if mistyped attribute #54852
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54851
  • Why Do I need call JS Code in Blazor apps? #54850
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #54849

Closed

  • Perf regression: caching, multiple_queries, plainTextSansFilter #54844
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54845

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54707
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Support resolving OpenApiPaths entries from document #54847
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Avoid O(N) string[] allocations for N header values in GetCommaSeparatedValues #54808
    Perf, area-networking
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `MergedStyle.SetStyle` appears to be CPU intensive #21539
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync on iOS scrolls vertically when Orientation is horizontal #21537
  • [BUG] .NET MAUI 9.0 Preview 2 Android debugger hangs up often when using UseInterpreter = false #21536
  • [BUG] In .NET 9.0 Preview 2, the last control of a layout is in some cases of incorrect size #21534
  • The app is crashing after sent to background IOS only #21533
  • Builds are significantly slower with Internet access #21532

Closed

  • iOS: Splash Screen Logo Scaling Issue in MAUI Apps #15782
  • Unable to debug IOS share extension or notification service extension #19716
  • O aplicativo não foi compilado #19814
  • iOS Debug cannot start but build and deploy works #19858
  • Launch and Debug for Mac Catalyst from Visual Studio Code succeeds but does not launch app #19985
  • Xcode 15+ VS 17.8.5 Can't get Simulators #20138
  • Suggestion: Add "Mobile" tag to MAUI project templates #20190
  • Error running default Maui/NET8 solution #20213
  • Visual Studio continues to create extra Apple provisioning profile and updates the maui csproj file with it #20248
  • MSB4062 error when publishing an Android APP on Azure Online Pipeline #20300
  • Itext or pdfsharp problem being investigated by Jon. #20316
  • Maui custom namespace not working when in current project #20326
  • Maui projects in Visual Studio stop building when changing Directory.Build.Props file #20971
  • dotnet maui xaml not found in creating a xaml file #21014
  • Impementation Error #21073
  • Selecting a link/button in a WebView MAUI app for IOS fails and unexpectedly shuts down app. #21157
    Backlog
  • Not Able to find .Net Multi-Platform Apps UI #17179
  • DisplayAlert not working on CommunityToolkit.Maui Popup #14870
  • Progress bar - add feature intermediate = true like in WPF #15324
    Backlog
  • Building IOS Release generate error "the selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects" #11368
    Backlog
  • Update .NET MAUI template to provide a window with a default title set #12646
    Backlog
  • Failing module Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll #9839
    Backlog
  • navigation bar is displayed(the gray line) #8443
  • DataTemplate bindings do not work #21481
    Backlog
  • Size WebView to content #18404
  • Page weak reference is still alive after pushing and popping pages modally or normally #21143

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    community ✨

Updated

  • Light up HideSoftInputOnTappedChanged for catalyst #21529
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Infer inline collection element type mappings from each other (and onto the projection) #33438
  • Ef core does not considering "DeleteBehavior.NoAction" while migration generation #33437
  • Set the ordering as the identifier when translating VALUES #33436
  • Entity mapped to JSON returns different byte[] when not the whole entity is projected #33435

Closed

  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit. #33327
    9.0.0
  • Add ability to configure multiple query filters on a given DbSet and disable them individually/specifically. #33432

PullRequests

Created

  • Transform JSON_VALUE() to OPENJSON/WITH when needed #33440
  • Fixes around identifier and type mappings for ValuesExpression #33439

Merged

  • Detect ambiguous InversePropertyAttribute on collection navigations. #33434
  • Refactor OperationTaskBase to derive from ToolTask #33367

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33305
    tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    tell-mode

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Always build poison detection #19245
  • Remove old publishing targets #19244

Merged

  • Package source mappings - follow up #19223
  • [main] Rebootstrap with latest changes #19145

Updated

  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
